statements: SELECT * FROM user_transactions
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit'
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM user_transactions GROUP BY transaction_type
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM user_transactions
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal' GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY transaction_id ORDER BY average_amount
SELECT transaction_date, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM user_transactions GROUP BY transaction_date HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY transaction_date
SELECT * FROM UserTransactions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM UserTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit'
SELECT * FROM InvestmentReports WHERE regulatory_compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT user_id, total_investment FROM InvestmentReports ORDER BY total_investment DESC
SELECT user_id, report_date, report_comments FROM InvestmentReports WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount, transaction_type FROM UserTransactions WHERE transaction_type='purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM UserTransactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT user_id, AVG(total_investment) AS avg_investment FROM InvestmentReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_investment > 5000 ORDER BY avg_investment DESC;
SELECT user_id, report_date, total_investment, regulatory_compliance_status FROM InvestmentReports WHERE regulatory_compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, report_date, total_investment, report_comments FROM InvestmentReports WHERE total_investment > 10000 ORDER BY total_investment DESC, report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT report_id, user_id, report_date FROM investment_reports WHERE investment_value > 5000

SELECT report_id, user_id, report_date, investment_value FROM investment_reports JOIN regulatory_compliance ON investment_reports.report_id = regulatory_compliance.report_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved'
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM investment_reports WHERE investment_value > 10000;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, report_date, investment_value FROM investment_reports ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT rt.regulation_id, rc.report_id, rc.compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance rc JOIN investment_reports ir ON rc.report_id = ir.report_id JOIN user_transactions ut ON ut.user_id = ir.user_id JOIN regulatory_compliance rt ON rt.report_id = rc.report_id WHERE ut.transaction_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM user_transactions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT user_accounts.user_id, user_accounts.account_balance, investment_records.investment_type FROM user_accounts JOIN investment_records ON user_accounts.user_id = investment_records.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM user_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM investment_records WHERE investment_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;

SELECT user_accounts.user_id, user_accounts.account_balance, investment_records.investment_type FROM user_accounts INNER JOIN investment_records ON user_accounts.user_id = investment_records.user_id WHERE user_accounts.account_balance > 5000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_phone FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT report_date, report_description FROM reports WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE trans_amount > 1000 ORDER BY trans_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, investment_amount FROM users JOIN investments ON users.user_id = investments.user_id WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE user_id = 3 AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_name, compliance_description FROM users JOIN regulatory_compliance ON users.user_id = regulatory_compliance.user_id ORDER BY compliance_date ASC;
